name: Syagen Technology
overview: Syagen Technology, Inc. designs and manufactures molecular analysis instruments for homeland security, defense, and life sciences markets. It offers explosives trace portal systems for explosives detection applications; narcotics trace portal system, which screens people and detects drugs of abuse at customs ports of entry, correctional facilities, and other fixed sites; and FieldMate, a portable mass spectrometer system. The company also provides PhotoMate Atmospheric Pressure Photoionization, an ionization source used in combination with liquid chromatography mass spectrometry (LC/MS) instruments for analysis of combinatorial drug libraries, target mass detection for purification methods, in-vitro pharmacokinetic and preclinical screening of drug candidate libraries, and peptide and protein analysis of cell lines. It offers its products through OEM manufacturers of LC/MS instrumentation. Syagen Technology, Inc. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tustin, California. As of April 29, 2011, Syagen Technology, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Morpho Detection, Inc..

acquisition.source_description: Morpho Detection Completes Acquisition of Syagen Technology
